trans-unit.source: The type that holds the event data.
Provides a type-safe collection list for storing listeners for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于存储 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 的侦听器的类型安全集合列表。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a type parameter for the event data that is used.
trans-unit.target: 这种用于定义使用的事件数据的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The number of items that should be allocated in the initial list.
trans-unit.target: 应在初始列表中分配的项数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> class with the specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的初始容量初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList" />, making deep copies of the values.
trans-unit.target: 创建该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList" /> 的可修改复本，从而制作值的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
An object that contains the event data.
The type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> that calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Delivers the event being managed to each listener in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 将正在托管的事件传送到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> 中的每个侦听器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any of the listeners in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> refer to an object that has been garbage collected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList`1" /> 中侦听器引用的对象已被垃圾回收，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为<see langword="false" /> 。
